root: ^Zuri: He's bad, this is bad, he's in rough shape, this is bad.

StartChoices: ^It's okay, it's okay, calm down. Tell me what happened.
^I got him now, tell me what's happened.
WhatHappened: ^Zuri: It was a gig, like any other, he performed, he was great, he's always great. We chatted, we danced, he was so - it was like any other day, he was really - he was - it was too normal. Now he's beaten, he's broken.
MessUpRepair: ^Focus now, tell me more about that night.
Repair_Success2: ^Zuri: Him on the stage. It's why I loved him, why we fell for each other too fast and too hard. He's energy and love and passion overflowing.
Repair_Fail2: ^Zuri: We were drunk, we were in the alley. God, we argued. It's so stupid now. He wanted to go out, to go to another bar...
